name: PerkinElmer, Inc.
description: PerkinElmer, Inc. is a global leader in life sciences and diagnostics, committed to innovating solutions that address the world's most pressing health challenges. Founded in 1937, PerkinElmer specializes in providing technology and services for the diagnostics, life sciences, and environmental markets. The company’s portfolio includes a range of advanced analytical instruments, reagents, and software that enable scientists and researchers to detect and quantify biological and chemical substances with high precision. PerkinElmer plays a vital role in improving human and environmental health, with products used in laboratories around the globe for applications in drug discovery, clinical diagnostics, and environmental monitoring. The company is particularly recognized for its contributions to newborn screening and reproductive health, ensuring early detection of diseases to enhance patient outcomes. Through continuous innovation and a commitment to quality, PerkinElmer strives to deliver exceptional value to its customers while advancing scientific understanding. The company also emphasizes sustainability and corporate responsibility, integrating these principles into its business strategies to have a lasting positive impact on society.
